property.name: hive.metastore.warehouse.dir
property.description: 指定hive数据存储位置,集群版对应hdfs路径,单机对应本地路径 location of default database for the warehouse

property.name: hive.support.concurrency
property.description: 设置是否支持acid,不开启时需要改为false Whether join and group by keys on tables are derived and maintained in the QueryPlan. This is useful to identify how tables are accessed and to determine if they should be bucketed.

property.name: hive.stats.collect.tablekeys
property.description: 开启对表的访问信息的解析功能 Whether join and group by keys on tables are derived and maintained in the QueryPlan. This is useful to identify how tables are accessed and to determine if they should be bucketed.

property.name: hive.stats.collect.scancols
property.description: 开启对表中列的访问信息的解析功能 Whether column accesses are tracked in the QueryPlan. This is useful to identify how tables are accessed and to determine if there are wasted columns that can be trimmed.
